name: homorhizome
description:
Through the use of generative adversarial networks, I seek to give genesis to the homorhizome (a new type of metaverse-human-being that respects the law of entropy and values the imminences of circularity, diversity, cooperative spirit and interdependence to live a harmonious life with nature).
I combine portraits of roots that I collected on my travels in the Amazon and beyond, using both analogue photography and Artificial intelligence techniques. Combining the past and the future in search of a prolonged present. An archetype of the future. 
artist: Pablo Radice © (@PabloRadice) | medium: PNG, 11489x6144pixels | original creation date: 9 November 2021

Diptych series ©.
